item.title: [pf21] Path of Ancestry
item.description:
Land

Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

{3}{U}: Draw a card.

item.title: [voc] Spectral Arcanist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Wizard

Flying

When Spectral Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of Spirits you control from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

item.title: [voc] Storm of Souls
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.

item.title: [voc] Stensia Masquerade
item.description:
Enchantment

Attacking creatures you control have first strike.

Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [voc] Spectral Shepherd
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

{1}{U}: Return target Spirit you control to its owner's hand.

item.title: [voc] Stromkirk Occultist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Horror

Trample

Whenever Stromkirk Occultist deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [voc] Stromkirk Condemned
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Horror

Discard a card: Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [voc] Stromkirk Captain
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Soldier

First strike

Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

item.title: [voc] Storm of Souls
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.

item.title: [voc] Sudden Salvation
item.description:
Instant

Choose up to three target permanent cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. You draw a card for each opponent who controls one or more of those permanents.

item.title: [voc] Sudden Salvation
item.description:
Instant

Choose up to three target permanent cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. You draw a card for each opponent who controls one or more of those permanents.

item.description:

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [voc] Timothar, Baron of Bats
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Noble

Ward—Discard a card.

Whenever another nontoken Vampire you control dies, you may pay {1} and exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. It gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return the exiled card to the battlefield tapped."

item.title: [voc] Timin, Youthful Geist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

Partner with Rhoda, Geist Avenger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Rhoda into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

Flying

At the beginning of each combat, tap up to one target creature.

item.title: [voc] Unclaimed Territory
item.description:
Land

As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

item.title: [voc] Twilight Drover
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover.

{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

Whenever another nontoken Vampire you control dies, you may pay {1} and exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. It gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return the exiled card to the battlefield tapped."

item.title: [voc] Vampiric Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Dragon

Flying

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vampiric Dragon this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampiric Dragon.

{1}{R}: Vampiric Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature.

item.title: [voc] Urge to Feed
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

Flying

item.title: [voc] Verity Circle
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.

{4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

item.title: [voc] Vandalblast
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact you don't control.

Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
